post.author: 박재홍
post.content:
If you are unhappy in your current job, or are looking for something different and more challenging, The National Job Fair might have just what you are searching for.

Where:   Metro Toronto Convention Centre
255 Front St. W. (North Bldg.), 222 Bremner Blvd. (South Bldg.)
Toronto,  ON

When:   10:00 am-8:00 pm Wednesday, Mar. 19, 2003
            10:00 am-8:00 pm Thursday, Mar. 20, 2003

Price:   $3, For more info call (416) 585-8000
post.title: The National Job Fair (Mar. 19 - 20, 2003)
